Introduction
This topic contains information about EPs and DOCs for claims, including
placing BDD and BDD-excluded claims under diary EP control
DOCs for pre-discharge claims
, and
EP and claim label
for initial establishment of BDD claims
adjustment following completion of BDD intake site development action
for BDD claims received electronically with 180 to 90 days remaining on active duty
for BDD-excluded claims received electronically with less than 90 days remaining on active duty
received electronically when a claim is already pending
options for initial establishment of claims excluded from the BDD program
, and
options for additional contentions by BDD claimants
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B - Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B
